text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san! A Happy New Year to you!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Let's keep dashing on down the Bakushin Road this year, too!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Without any further ado, I've written my New Year's resolutions!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I am an honors student after all, so I started writing them just eight hours after the date changed!
choice_data_list: So, you wrote them when you woke up.
So, you wrote them when you woke up.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Precisely!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, you'll be so impressed with the goal I wrote you'll want to frame it and hang it!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Please gaze upon and be moved to tears by my wonderful aspirations!
(Stare…)
Somehow, I already knew what it was, but when I opened the half-sheet of paper she handed me, I saw…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Precisely!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Satsuki Sho, Japan Derby, Kikka Sho, and now plus the Arima Kinen!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Let's win these races this year just as planned, and paint the Classic in Bakushin colors!
I'm kind of moved to tears, but in a different way……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: They say the beginning is the key to everything. So, I'll start training today right away!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Come, now, please let me exercise my incredible talent!
choice_data_list:
Now is the time to conserve your energy to hatch and 
spread your wings, like a butterfly. 
take a break.
Well, what do you want to do?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Bakushin towards tomorrow! In other words, that means…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: …What does that mean?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Oh…! Oh-ho……!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I see! Surely, with my speed, I can outrun time itself!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: So, I'm going to go run the Classic… That's it, isn't it!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Understood! I'm going to go and Bakushin towards tomorrow!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Bakushin, Bakushiiiin!!
After that, I trained with Sakura Bakushin O to increase her speed in the new year.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Wait to hatch…?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ha, could it be, Trainer-san…!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: But, I'm sorry!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I believe in you, Trainer-san. But…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san is Trainer-san! I cannot see you as anything more than that!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Even though I'm certain I'll turn into a very Bakushin butterfly, I want to wait before I… hatch anyone's eggs!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Above all, impure relations are a no-go for the class president!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: It seems we should keep our distance from each other for now.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: It's hard to shake off your feelings for magnificent me. But… I'll be waiting for you tomorrow, believe me!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hah, it seems the class president still leads an impure existence.
………  Let's rest.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: What I… want to do.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: You know, I'm not impressed with your carefree attitude of leaving everything up to me!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Nevertheless, it's an excellent decision to ask for my opinion as a superior class president.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: So, I shall tell you! What I want to do is—

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ehhh!? Why such restrictions!?
choice_data_list: Do something different every once in a while.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I see, you want to see my balanced variety of ideas… So that's how it is.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Understood! Allow me to answer one more time.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: What I want to do, besides get faster, is—

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: ―nothing!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: On the contrary, what else does one need in life but to speed up!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Please tell me, O teacher!
… After that, Sakura Bakushin O and I exchanged various opinions about training. This seems to have led to her growth.
